title: What Next: Is Biden Flunking COVID?
description:
President Biden, unlike his predecessor, was able to spend some time planning his COVID-19 response. One year in, is the plan working?
Guest: Dan Diamond, national health reporter for the Washington Post. 
If you enjoy this show, please consider signing up for Slate Plus. itunes:title: What Next: Is Biden Flunking COVID?
itunes:author: Slate Podcasts
itunes:subtitle: Something’s wrong with the plan. Or the message. Or the messengers. Or, maybe, there’s a problem with all three.
